titles.title: Healthy at Home on Base Act of 2024
Healthy at Home on Base Act of 2024

A bill to direct the Secretary of Defense, in consultation with the heads of certain agencies and organizations, to conduct a study on the health effects of indoor residential mold growth in military unaccompanied housing or other housing on military installations, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
